comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content:
I wouldn't actually describe this as being "at Mt Kosciusko".   Its 25 kilometres as the crow flies,  and more by road.  It is a lot further from Mt Kosciusko than  Thredbo or Charlotte Pass village or Perisher Valley are.

I'd say "Hotel Kosciusko,  Kosciusko National Park",    or   "Hotel Kosciusko,  Snowy Mountains".
